predicate.note: Frames file for 'examine' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No access to verbnet. Comparison to 'look' and 'study'.

roleset.name: look at closely

example.name: passivized
example.text: Valley Federal is currently being examined *trace* by regulators.

example.name: active
example.text: Mr. Paul says that he has feelers out over much of the globe and that potential buyers from as far away as Japan and Italy have examined the collection.
example.arg: potential buyers from as far away as Japan and Italy

roleset.note: I have the feeling an arg2 'examined for' might be necessary, but we'll wait for an example from the corpus before including it.
